title: Fix staff portal authentication error for vijaya credentials

requirements.text: Fix the backend authenticateStaff method to properly validate the username 'vijaya' with password 'vijaya' and return a valid authentication token instead of returning an unauthorized error

quotes: The error showing is unauthorised entry with using the same credentials

acceptanceCriteria: The authenticateStaff method successfully authenticates user 'vijaya' with password 'vijaya'
A valid authentication token is returned upon successful login
No 'unauthorised entry' error is displayed when using correct credentials

requirements.text: Verify that the staff user 'vijaya' exists in the backend storage with correct credentials and activated status set to true

quotes: The error showing is unauthorised entry with using the same credentials

acceptanceCriteria: Staff user 'vijaya' exists in backend storage
Account activation status is set to true

requirements.text: Ensure the StaffLoginForm component correctly handles the authentication response and stores the token in localStorage via useStaffAuth hook

quotes: Couldn't login shows first time login prompt with internet identity bit not redirecting to the page

acceptanceCriteria: Authentication token is properly stored in localStorage after successful login
User is redirected to staff appointments page after successful authentication
No Internet Identity prompt is shown when using username/password login

constraints: Do not modify the Internet Identity authentication system
Maintain the 24-hour token expiry mechanism in localStorage
nonGoals: Adding Internet Identity to the staff login flow
Changing the username/password authentication method to another system
Creating new staff user accounts beyond fixing the 'vijaya' credentials
